title: Speak
summary: Make Mycroft repeat whatever you want
short_description: Make Mycroft repeat whatever you want
description: Turn Mycroft into a parrot.  Speak a phrase and listen to it repeated in Mycroft's selected voice.
examples: repeat once upon a midnight dreary, while i pondered, weak and weary, over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore
speak i can say anything you'd like!
